name: Zill O'll - Infinite
synopsis: Zill O'll - Infinite - is a port of the PSX RPG ''Zill O'll'' with new scenarios and endings added. Set on the continent of Bioscian, you head out to a guild to take on different jobs and earn money. You control a character who has "Soul," giving him access to many different abilities. The game includes six soul types: Brave, Kind, Search, Belief, Wild and Cool. Once you've cleared a mission, you receive points which can be split between these facets of your character.
